original_text: And the children of Israel did so: and Joseph gave them wagons, according to the commandment of Pharaoh, and gave them provision for the way.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 아들들이 그대로 할새 요셉이 바로의 명령대로 그들에게 수레를 주고 길 양식을 주며

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel did so
according to the commandment of Pharaoh
and gave them provision for the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 길을 위한 양식을 주었다
